sentence.Network_en: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

sentence.Network_en: Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentence.Network_en: The simple concepts he had been taught now sounded trite and naive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾经被教导的简单观念如今听起来陈腐而幼稚。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一种是天真(naive)的人，而另人种是无知(ignorant)的人。为什麽是最幸福呢??幸福在他们什麽都不知道，对整个世界没有太深的了解…

means.word_mean: 简单,单纯,天真;纯洁,不世故,轻信

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French naïve, feminine of naïf, from Latin nativus 'native, natural'

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲：Naive 演唱：陈珊妮 所属专辑：《I Love You, John》歌曲介绍 台湾音乐才女陈珊妮最新国语专辑《I Love You, John》中的歌曲《Naive》，节奏轻快明朗，歌词简单寓有深意。歌词 天有天懂的风云 就像你自有你的神韵 月有月沉溺的缺 越凝视越是看不清 云有云懂的秩序 就像你自有你的乐趣 风由风自由面对 我就是睁不开眼睛 Naive 是我的病 不管这种世界有没有人了解我 Naive 是我的病 自私自悲自哀自恋自在的生活 又怎

entry.def: If you describe someone as naive, you think they lack experience and so expect things to be easy or people to be honest or kind.

example.ex: It's naive to think that teachers are always tolerant...
example.tran: 认为老师们总那么宽容是幼稚的。

example.ex: I must have been naive to think we would get my parents' blessing.
example.tran: 我一定太天真了，竟认为我们会得到我父母的祝福。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by or showing unaffected simplicity and lack of guile or worldly experience;

sentences.sentence: "the naive assumption that things can only get better"
"this naive simple creature with wide friendly eyes so eager to believe appearances"

auth_sentence.content: It is a very naive image and simple animation.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a very naive image and simple animation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a very naive image and simple animation.

auth_sentence.content: Either you are naive or part of the coverup!
auth_sentence.res_content: Either you are naive or part of the coverup!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Either you are naive or part of the coverup!

auth_sentence.content: It was naive but I felt weird about that.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was naive but I felt weird about that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was naive but I felt weird about that.

means.word_mean: 幼稚的; 无经验的; 单纯的

sentences.en: It's naive of you to believe he'll do what he says.
sentences.cn: 相信他会言行一致, 你未免太单纯了。

sentences.en: Don't be so naive as to be taken in by their lies.
sentences.cn: 不要太轻信, 以免被他们的谎言所欺骗。

sentences.en: She is so naive that she believes everything he tells her.
sentences.cn: 她如此天真以致相信他告诉她的一切。

jushi.english: The youngest boy was laughed at for his naive remarks.
jushi.chinese: 最年幼的男孩因幼稚的话被嘲笑。

jushi.english: The children's naive looks remind me of my childhood.
jushi.chinese: 这些孩子天真烂漫的样子使我想起了自己的童年。

jushi.english: These lovely children are very naive and carefree.
jushi.chinese: 这些可爱的孩子们非常纯真且无忧无虑。
